name: Kosmobreak
description:
The player finds himself on a spaceship and in order to survive as long as possible, he needs to kill monsters. Killed monsters drop gems.
Don’t forget to buy new weapons and armor during the time, so you will be able to live as long as possible and kill a large number of enemies!
The goal of the game is that the player needs to kill as many enemies as possible and set a record. To make it more interesting to play, there is an online table of records that allows you to compare your results with the results of other players.

Good luck in battle!
